wikipedia_page.main:
Dave Cooke (born c. 1954) is the founder of two charities: Operation Christmas Child and Teams4U.
Cooke founded the charity Operation Christmas Child (now Samaritan's Purse) in 1990 and developed, then worked for, the biggest shoebox programme in the world.

response: * Dave Cooke (born 1952), Canadian NDP politician from Windsor, Ontario
* Dave Cooke (businessman) (born 1950s), founder of charities Operation Christmas Child and Teams4U
